name: QWORK 90 Degree Right Angle Drill Attachment Adapter with 8mm Hex Compatibility for Power and Hand Drills
short_description: Durable Construction: This drill attachment is made from aluminium casing with heat-treated steel shank and metal gears.

Universal Compatibility: Equipped with an 8mm hex shank, the product fits a wide range of hand and power drills including air, electric, and cordless, as well as various sanding or buffing attachments.
Precision Performance: This angle drill attachment features a 10mm keyed chuck with a holding range of 1.0mm to 10mm.
Enhanced Accessibility: The product is designed with a 90-degree handle chuck to effectively reach confined and hard-to-reach areas.
Easy to Install: This right-angle drill attachment measures 155mm in length with a sturdy metal handle, ensuring ease of installation.

name: Right Angle Drill Attachment, ABS Handle Electric Screwdriver Repair 90 Degree Corner Adapter for 18v Impact Driver and Drill Bit, Perfect for Driving Screws in Tight Spaces(Orange)
short_description: 【DURABLE MATERIAL】Full metal casting structure of ABS, high-strength alloy steel provides good strength and durability, drop-resistant, rust-resistant, strong enough, thick, can be used for a long time.

【90 DEGREE ANGLE】The 90° angle of the electric screw driver corner device allows for excellent access when drilling or driving in narrow and hard-to-reach areas, suitable for use in different areas, more practical.

【HUMANIZED HANDLE DESIGN】This right angle driver drill adapter adopts with an ergonomic ABS handle, which does not get hot while in use, so it allows for tighter access with your current impact driver to increase gear strength.

【10 SHOCKWAVE POSITIONS】The corner device with 10 shockwave positions, included PH2, PZ1, PZ2, PZ3, TX10, TX15, TX20, TX25, TX30, suitable for the latest 18V impact driver and drill bit, to meet your daily needs.

【LIGHT WEIGHT DESIGN】Not only helping you reach the difficult places, this angled extension is also lightweight and compact, so it won't weigh down your arm as you work on those awkward screws, more easier to use.

name: Right Angle Drill Adaptor,4-in-1 Impact Drill Bit Extension,360° Rotatable 1/4 3/8 1/2" Impact Grade Socket Adapter Set,105 Degree Angle Screwdriver Drill Bit for Household Workplace Industry
short_description: Package includes: you will get 1 piece of 105 degree right angle drill driver and 3 pieces of 360° Rotatable hex shank driver drill bits, which provide the various sizes of tools for you to use

Quality material: these impact grade driver sockets adapters are made of chromium vanadium steel, and have strength and wear resistance, which are strong, stable, and not easy to break so that you can keep them for a long time

Multifunction: 3-piece power drill sockets adapter sets, 360° rotatable hex shank impact driver socket adapter used in the installation of pneumatic screwdriver, electric screwdriver, pneumatic drill, manual screwdriver and other installation for the hexagonal tool. It is a good accessory for conversion. For universal socket, impact adapter and reducer set, universal joint set, socket adapter and drive reducer set, drive impact socket extension bar set, drive impact socket set

Flexible tools: 360 degree rotatable socket adapter set can evenly distribute the torque load on a wider surface area, and allows access to a narrower workplace to significantly improve the performance, which is more convenient to use and saves your time and energy

105 Degree angle steel drill bit: the reliable 105 degree angle drill bit has the characters of strong strength, hardness and rust resistance, which can be connected with electric drill, rechargeable electric drill and manual wrench

Features: 105° designs for tight spaces, extends the power of a cordless screwdriver - 100 in/lbs. torque, 400 RPM. These tools are work great for light drilling, slow speed/screw driving, like cordless drill, ratchet hand screwdriver,etc

Wide applications: this impact socket adapter set is suitable for light drilling, slow speed or screw drives, ratchet hand screwdrivers and so on, which can be applied at homes, warehouses, garages, repair shops, daily repairs, etc

name: Flexible Drill Bit Extension Set with Right Angle Attachment, 360° Rotatable 1/4 3/8 1/2" Impact Grade Socket Adapter Sets for Cordless Drill & Screwdriver, Power Drill & Driver
short_description: 【Exquisite Suit】Humanized suit design includes many commonly used tools that you need, eliminating the need to purchase specific parts separately, this means you can get started right away! Package included 105° Right Angle Drill Adaptor*1, and 360° Rotatable Impact Grade Socket Adapter*3 (1/4 3/8 1/2").

【105°Right Angle Drill Adaptor】Torque: 400 RPM, chromium-vanadium steel makes quality more stable, It features 3 ball bearings and a built-in strong magnet for good holding power, suitable for all electric drills and socket wrenches. The 1/4" hex socket accepts and holds standard drill and driver bits, making it quick change compatible so that it fits most power drills, rechargeable drills, manual wrenches, and driver chucks.

【Rotatable Impact Grade Socket Adapter】360° rotatable hex shank impact driver socket adapter can evenly distribute the torque load on a wider surface area and allows access to a narrower workplace to significantly improve the performance, used in the installation of a pneumatic screwdriver, electric screwdriver, pneumatic drill, manual screwdriver and other hexagonal tools.

【Wide applications】This impact socket adapter set is suitable for light drilling, slow speed or screw drives, ratchet hand screwdrivers and so on, which can be applied at homes, warehouses, garages, repair shops, daily repairs, etc.

【After-sale service】Fruholt drill bits are made of aircraft carrier steel and high-quality raw materials, industrial-grade heavy-duty chrome-vanadium steel, which is durable and high-pressure resistant. 90 degree head and flexible shaft of the right angle drill attachment reaches tight spaces
